Name: Capital Cost|Electricity|Biomass|w/ CCS
Definition: Capital cost of a new biomass power plant with CCS. If more than one CCS biomass power technology is modelled, modellers should report capital costs for each represented CCS biomass power technology by adding variables Capital Cost|Electricity|Biomass|w/ CCS|2, ...
